title: mahAdEva pAhimAm
sahitya:
mAhAdEva pAhimAm mAtanga carmAbara dhara


anupallavi

  mahEsha kailAsa sadana sarvam sahAdarA-bharaNa sadA


caraNam    niratam dEhimE tava karuNAm vara mauni vinuta nAma nArAyaNI patinuta purahara 
bhavahara shankara vara vitaraNa suguNa shIla karadhrta shUla sujana pAla muraLIgAna vilOla
